short.am,ar,bg,bn,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Play Candy Tiles as a Chrome extension - Try it now!
short.ca: Jugueu a Candy Tiles com a extensió de Chrome - Proveu-ho ara!
short.es: ¡Juega Candy Tiles como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Mängi Candy Tilesit Chrome'i laiendina - proovi kohe järgi!
short.fi: Pelaa Candy Tilesia Chrome-laajennuksena - Kokeile nyt!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Candy Tiles bilang Chrome extension - Subukan mo na ngayon!
short.fr: Jouez à Candy Tiles en tant qu'extension Chrome - Essayez maintenant !
short.he,ms,no: ¡Juega a Candy Tiles como una extensión de Chrome - ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.hi: Juega a Candy Tiles como una extensión de Chrome: ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.hu: Játssz a Candy Tiles nevű játékkal Chrome-bővítményként - Próbáld ki most!
short.it: Gioca a Candy Tiles come estensione di Chrome - Provalo ora!
short.ko: Play Candy Tiles를 Chrome 확장 프로그램으로 이용하세요 - 지금 시도해보세요!
short.lt: Jouez à Candy Tiles en tant qu'extension Chrome - Essayez-le maintenant!
short.nl: Speel Candy Tiles als een Chrome-uitbreiding - Probeer het nu!
short.ro: Joacă Candy Tiles ca extensie Chrome - Încearcă acum!
short.sl: Igrajte Candy Tiles kot Chrome razširitev - Preizkusite zdaj!
short.th: เล่น Candy Tiles เป็นส่วนขยายของ Chrome - ลองเลย!
short.vi: Chơi Candy Tiles dưới dạng tiện ích Chrome - Hãy thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 在Chrome扩展中玩糖果瓷砖-立即体验！
short.zh_TW: 在 Chrome 擴充功能中玩糖果瓦片 - 立刻試試看！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🍬🎮, the sweetest Chrome extension to jazz up your browsing experience! Say goodbye to dull, monotonous new tab pages and hello to a world of colorful fun! With Candy Tiles, every new tab is a delightful surprise, adorned with vibrant candy-themed tiles that add a pop of joy to your day.

🌟 Features:

Customizable Layout: Arrange your tiles to suit your style and preferences. Whether you prefer a neat grid or a playful scatter, Candy Tiles lets you design your browsing canvas just the way you like it.
Endless Themes: From candy canes to lollipops, explore a plethora of themes that cater to your sweet tooth. Switch it up daily for a fresh burst of sweetness every time you open a new tab.
Quick Access: Need to access your favorite sites in a flash? Candy Tiles makes it easy with quick links to your most visited websites, all within arm's reach.
Interactive Fun: Click, drag, and play around with the tiles for a satisfyingly interactive experience that adds a touch of whimsy to your browsing routine.
Get ready to indulge in a visual feast every time you open a new tab with Candy Tiles! 🍭✨
